EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Americas_Nurture_TFE731_Certified Engine Exchanges_JRD.201804_Americas_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Now Available: Exchange Your TFE731 Engine with Honeywell
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
For a limited time, you can exchange your existing TFE731 engine with Honeywell for a certified, pre-owned and warrantied TFE731 engine.
Exchange your current TFE731 engine with Honeywell today and receive a minimum core value for your trade-in. When you do, you’ll receive up to a one year warranty on the purchased engine and we’ll pay for shipping both ways.
We inspect and test our pre-owned TFE731 engines before they're delivered to you or the service center of your choice.
And the best part? Buying an engine only takes minutes and you don’t need to create an account.
Browse our certified, pre-owned inventory and choose the engine that’s right for you today. Hurry, they’ll go quick!
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
